sentence.Network_en: The president insisted that he was acting out of compassion, not opportunism.
sentence.Network_cn: 总统坚持说他如此做是出于同情而不是为了投机。

sentence.Network_en: I wasn't going to demean myself by acting like a suspicious wife.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不会表现得像个疑神疑鬼的妻子一样自贬身价。

sentence.Network_en: For years the teaching of acting has been shrouded in mystery.
sentence.Network_cn: 多年以来表演教学一直蒙着神秘的面纱。

entry.def: Acting is the activity or profession of performing in plays or films.

example.ex: She pursued an acting career after four years of modelling.
example.tran: 当了4年的模特之后她踏上了演艺之路。

entry.def: You use acting before the title of a job to indicate that someone is doing that job temporarily.

means.word_mean: 1. the performance of a part or role in a drama
1. serving temporarily especially as a substitute;

auth_sentence.content: We regret not acting faster to sort things out.
auth_sentence.res_content: We regret not acting faster to sort things out.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We regret not acting faster to sort things out.

auth_sentence.content: But acting too slowly has huge risks, too.
auth_sentence.res_content: But acting too slowly has huge risks, too.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But acting too slowly has huge risks, too.

auth_sentence.content: They were charged with acting as unregistered foreign agents.
auth_sentence.res_content: They were charged with acting as unregistered foreign agents.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They were charged with acting as unregistered foreign agents.

stems_affixes.word_buile: act行动,活动,做+ing……的→adj.代理的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 积极的, 能起作用的, 现行的
stems_affixes.word_buile: act行动,活动,做+ive……的→积极的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的
stems_affixes.word_buile: act做+ual=al……的→做了的→实际的, 真实的
exact[v.强求;精确的]+ing……的→adj.苛求的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 反应的, 起反作用的, 反动的, 电抗性的
stems_affixes.word_buile: react反应;反抗+ive……的→反应的,反动的
act行动,活动,做→v.行动,行为,扮演 n.[戏]幕

stems_affixes.value_cn: 动作, 作用, 战斗, 行动, 举动, 行为
stems_affixes.word_buile: act活动+ion动作或状态→动作,活动
act行动,活动,做+ivity特性→活动
in不+activity活跃→n.不活跃

stems_affixes.value_cn: 反应, 反作用, 反动[力]
stems_affixes.word_buile: react反应;反抗+ion动作或状态→n.反应, 反作用, 反动[力]
react反应+or物器→n.反应堆
act行动,活动,做→v.行动,行为,扮演 n.[戏]幕
act行动,活动,做+ivate使→使……活动
actual实际的+ize化→实际化→实现
counter反+act行动,活动,做→反着动→力量对抗→抵消
en使+act行动,活动,做→使[法律]动→实施法律
ex出+act行动,活动,做→[要求]做出来→强求
inter相互+act行动,活动,做→相互动→相互作用
re反+act行动,活动,做→反动;反应
trans横+act行动,活动,做→横向动→互相贸易或交易

Sentence.sentence: Yes, but I was going to say I thought the acting was terrible.
Shouting or acting rude will get you nowhere.
He was best at acting in Hollywood tragedies.
So how did he get into acting
Well, first he acted in plays at high school, then he went to college in California where he got seriously into acting.

sentences.en: They will continue Mr. Kabe as acting principal of the school.
sentences.cn: 他们将继续让凯布先生做该校代理校长。

sentences.en: John was acting chairman at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 约翰是会议的代理主席。

means.word_mean: 起作用的；活动着的；产生影响的
(剧本)适于演出的；供(演员)演出用的

sentences.en: Acting with an amateur theatrical group can be fun.
sentences.cn: 和业余戏剧团一起演出可能是有趣的。

sentences.en: Acting runs in their blood;they have been actors for more than 150 years.
sentences.cn: 演戏是他们家族遗传的天性,过去150年一直都有人当演员。

sentences.en: It was her teacher’s encouragement that led her into acting.
sentences.cn: 她老师的鼓励促使她从事了演戏这一行当。
